column13: Frozen liver samples were homogenized using 2.8mm ceramic beads (Mo Bio cat.no.13114-50) and RNA was extracted using Trizol reagent, treated with DNase, quality control was checked using Agilent Nano chip.
column14: RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols.
column16: 140 RNA-seq samples from 70 HCC tumors and matched nontumor tissue were pooled and sequenced on NovaSeq using Illumina TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Kit RS-122-2201 and paired-end sequencing.
column17: The sequencing quality of the reads was assessed using FastQC (version 0.11.5), Preseq (version 2.0.3)32, Picard tools (version 1.119), and RSeQC (version 2.6.4).
column18: Reads were trimmed using Cutadapt (version 1.14)33 to remove sequencing adapters, prior to mapping to the human reference genome hg38 using STAR (version 2.5.2b) in two-pass mode34.
column19: Across the samples, the median percentage of mapped reads was 95.4%.  Expression levels were quantified using RSEM version 1.3.035 with GENCODE annotation version 2136.
column20: The RSEM counts were then normalized using the voom algorithm37 from the Limma R package (version 3.40.6)
column22: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: tab-delimited text data matrices with genes as rows and samples as columns: RSEM_GeneCounts.txt is an integer matrix of transcript counts, voom_GeneExpression.txt is the voom-normalized gene expression.
